title: API Configuration
description: Sets up a GET endpoint at /ts/pets/:id where the :id is the specific pet you want to find.

title: ID Validation
description: Checks that the pet ID in the URL is valid before trying to look it up.

title: Finding the Pet
description: Searches the store for a pet with the matching ID.

title: Not Found
description: If no pet exists with that ID, returns a 404 error saying the pet wasn't found.

title: Success Response
description: If the pet is found, returns all its details with a 200 OK status.

title: Error Handling
description: Catches problems like invalid IDs or other unexpected errors and returns appropriate error messages.
